Class EfficientRater

  • java.lang.Object
    • EfficientRater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rater

    public class EfficientRater
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rater
    ArrayList implementation of Rater that collects all rates of a rater with given id.
    Version:
    05/09/2021
    Author:
    Rafael Zuolo Coppini Lima
